title: Hotel Booking System
description: Developed a modern hotel booking application using Next.js and Redux for state management, ensuring a seamless and responsive user experience. Implemented user authentication and profile management, along with advanced filtering options for personalized search results. Integrated Cloudinary for efficient image processing and storage, Tailwind CSS for a sleek and responsive UI, and TypeScript for robust code quality. Utilized MongoDB for scalable and efficient data management.

features.mongodb: MongoDB / Mongoose Object Data Modeling (ODM) library
